nodes.text: The Aparo sector was a sector that the Hydian Way passed through before ending in the neighbouring Corporate Sector in the Outer Rim Territories, which also bordered the Wyl sector and Wild Space.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Aparo sector was mentioned in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18. The sector originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook, a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Michael Allen Horne and published by West End Games in 1993.
